items.heading: Senior Interactive Developer
items.description: Create animated html5 ads, build and send email campaigns, manage digital videos, and maintain existing WordPress sites.

items.heading: Front-End Developer
items.description: Create static frontend, and a complete WordPress site, for 2 different clients in the education sector

items.heading: Senior Developer
items.description: Creates custom WordPress sites mostly in the medical, non-profit, and real estate sectors. Implementing systems, organizing projects, and working closely with clients to fulfill their vision. Documents processes and produce tutorials for Clients. Mentors Junior Designers and creative team on development processes.

items.heading: Technical Specialist III
items.description: Develop and maintain customizable functions to validate, clean, and optimize product data feeds across various shopping engines for a variety of clients and migrate VBScript to JavaScript.

items.heading: Brander, Team COBRA
items.description: Work with critical, major, and minor issues and updates on existing user-friendly cross platform mobile websites and apps for major retailers across the globe.

items.heading: Web Developer
items.description: Maintain and implement new features and upgrades in existing custom content publication system, promote and improve best practices.

items.heading: Full Stack Web Developer
items.description: Implement cross-platform mobile websites and multimedia, redesign and modify multiple WordPress sites, templates, and plugins, and modify existing projects. Update and optimize a python game and make it cross-platform compatible. Setup and administer virtual hosting for projects.

items.heading: Web Developer
items.description: Maintain and develop eCommerce websites for over 200 automotive dealerships nationwide, including marketing and mobile sites, custom CMS modules, SEO Optimization, and 3rd party technologies.

items.heading: Multimedia Designer
items.description: Film, edit, compose, render, optimize, and transcribe thousands of videos for use in an online patient education system. Design and Animate Marketing materials for print and web. Develop best-practices for compression, storage and playback of all digital media.

items.heading: Steel City Codefest
items.description: Team Hyperham worked with The Pittsburgh Downtown Partnership (PDP) & City of Pittsburgh Department of Public Works (DPW) to create the SmarTrash website and 2 apps to assist in communications between the PDP & DPW to help keep Pittsburgh’s streets clean.

items.heading: CodeSchool, Codecademy, FreeCodeCamp, SoloLearn
items.description: Studied AngularJS, Ember, C#, JavaScript, Ruby/Rails, Python, GIT, Mongo DB, Bootstrap, and more.

items.heading: B.S. Interactive Multimedia Design
items.description: Studied Design, Videography, Photography, Philosophy, Psychology, and more. Tutored peers.
